data.title: Jimmy & Andrew Books
data.meta_description: Learn more and purchase American Stonehenge, the first book in the series "The Adventures of Jimmy and Andrew"! You can buy the hardcopy book and we'll ship it safely to your door. If you're more of an e-book fanatic, we have Kindle, Google Books, SmashBooks, and Nook available
data.text:
Want your purchase

to do even more?​

​

If you want a portion of your hardcopy book purchase to go to one of our partnered shelters, please click on the button below, select a shelter and click on their link.

​

By purchasing via that link, 30% of your purchase price will be donated to them in your name!

Standard Shipping 3-7 Days

American Stonehenge is the first book in the new series The Adventures of Jimmy and Andrew. Secrets to some of our world’s most ancient and mysterious legends are revealed to our two heroes in their first epic adventure.

Hardcopy Description

7 1/2” x 10”, Perfect bound with flaps that fold out to reveal the breathtaking panoramic cover illustration. There’s nothing like holding a real book in your hand! 33 full-page, full-color, hand-painted illustrations show a cinematic view of the major scene from each chapter. Heavyweight, coated paper helps the illustrations’ rich, vibrant colors pop off the page and immerse readers in the story. The high-quality material of the pages and the cover make this a durable volume that’s sure to last for years.

​

E-Books

Also Available in eBook and epub

"Digital downloads” are versions of the book that can be read on an eReader device, like a Kindle Fire, a Nook or on an iPad, iPhone or Apple computer. Our digital download versions have all the hand-painted illustrations and sketches that the printed version has, so you won’t miss a thing.

​

Digital Downloads are sold on other sites. Below is a list of sites where you can buy a digital version of American Stonehenge.

The Kindle Fire edition of American Stonehenge is full color with interactive links for jumping to chapters. It is a Print Replica version, so you’ll see the book exactly the way it appears in print. You’ll need a Kindle Fire device to read it.

The Apple Books edition of American Stonehenge is full color with interactive links for jumping to chapters. The Apple Book edition also has additional links to the sketches and illustrations, so when you are in the mood to feast your eyes on the gorgeous artwork, you can jump directly to the 33 hand-painted illustrations and 10 sketches.

The Nook edition of American Stonehenge is full color. The text is reflowable, so it will conform to the page size of your Nook e-reader. It has all the illustrations and sketches.

The Google Play edition of American Stonehenge is full color. The text is reflowable, so it will conform to the page size of your e-reader. It has all the illustrations and sketches. It can be read using the Play app on Apple, Android or on your web browser.

The Kobo Rakuten edition of American Stonehenge is full color. The text is reflowable, so it will conform to the size of your Kobo e-reader. It has all the illustrations and sketches. It can be read on any of the Kobo readers or with the Kobo app on Apple, Android or desktop.

The Smashwords edition of American Stonehenge is full color. The text is reflowable, so it will conform to the size of your e-reader app. It has all the illustrations and sketches. It can be read on your personal computer using Adobe Digital Editions or can be downloaded to Apple iPad, iPhone, iOS, Kindle, Kindle Fire, Nook or Kobo.
